xml.data:
Home » 5V Parivārapāḷi » 2 Bhikkhunivibhaṅga » 2.2 Dutiyabhāga
2.2.6 Adhikaraṇavāra
Bhikkhunivibhaṅga
Dutiyabhāga
Adhikaraṇavāra
254.
1064Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ? Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ…pe… . (1)
1065Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ? Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ—  āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. (2)
1066Adhikaraṇavāro niṭṭhito chaṭṭho.
<< 2.2.5 Samuṭṭhānavāraup2.2.7 Samathavāra >>
